meanings.sent1: She carillonned the bells beautifully at the church.
meanings.sent2: Every Sunday, the church bells carillonned throughout the town.
meanings.sent3: The carillonned bells made the pigeons dance in the square.
meanings.sent4: Her music carillonned through the air like a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The joyful carillonned melody filled the entire village with happiness.

meanings.sent1: The carillonned chimes echoed across the valley.
meanings.sent2: As the sun set, the carillonned bells signaled the end of the day.
meanings.sent3: The carillonned music seemed to have a conversation with the wind.
meanings.sent4: The carillonned notes danced in the air like colorful butterflies.
meanings.sent5: The carillonned sound was so clear, it felt like the bells were right next to you.

meanings.sent1: The carillonned of the bells could be heard from miles away.
meanings.sent2: After the concert, the carillonned was still ringing in their ears.
meanings.sent3: The carillonned was so loud, it startled the sleeping cat.
meanings.sent4: The carillonned of the bells was a reminder of the upcoming festival.
meanings.sent5: The beautiful carillonned of the church bells brought tears to her eyes.
